subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox’ Josh Beckett pitched the first one-hitter of his career Wednesday night, limiting the host Tampa Bay Rays to Reid Brignac’s third-inning infield single in a 3-0 Red Sox win.
snippet: The Red Sox’ Josh Beckett pitched the first one-hitter of his career Wednesday night, limiting the host Tampa Bay Rays to Reid Brignac’s third-inning infield single in a 3-0 Red Sox win.
